Title: Mouchuki Forest Bungalow
Actors: Sovonjit Ghosh, Animesh Banerjee, Arijit Sengupta, Debashree Bakshi
Plot: Mouchuki Forest Bungalow is the first Bengali found footage horror film. It is an edited version of recovered footage from handy-cam of three friends which recorded the paranormal experience of their four days in an unknown forest.
